removeCombatant.title: Remove Combatant

removeGroup.title: Remove Group
removeGroup.message: Are you sure you want to remove the combatant {{name}}?

removePlayer.title: Delete Player
removePlayer.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} from saved players?

deleteCombat.title: Delete Combat

deleteFromLibrary.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
